entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 03:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
